result.execSummary:
The defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Endangering Safety by use of a Dangerous Weapon (Pointing), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.20(1)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court ordered the defendant to pay costs, fees and surcharges up to the amount of cash bail on deposit.
Consecutive to: consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 2 days time served.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.descr: Endangering Safety by use of a Dangerous Weapon (Pointing)
charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demetrius Devone Bogan

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan in court with attorney Ann M Heaps.  May Y. Lee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Case calendared for sentencing hearing.  Offer placed on the record by the state.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the state, defense and defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1: Court ordered defendant to serve 30 DAYS in the House of Correction consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 2 days time served.

Court ordered the defendant to pay costs, fees and surcharges up to the amount of cash bail on deposit.

Filed;
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
Pretrial Incarceration Credit.

Defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan in court with attorney Ann M Heaps.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk    Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead NO CONTEST.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, jury instruction and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.
Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 4.    All parties are notified that effective August 1, 2016 this case will be assigned to Judge Hannah Dugan - Branch 31 in Room 622 - Courthouse.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan in court with attorney Ann M Heaps.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense counsel advised the Court that the defendant is a witness in a matter proceeding in a felony court today and defense counsel has not yet confirmed if her speedy trial is proceeding in another court.  The court will be proceeding with another matter and orders case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 4.  Jury trial scheduled for July 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan in court with attorney Ann M Heaps.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Case calendared for jury trial.  First call.  Parties are ready to proceed.  Defense has a speedy trial scheduled in another court today.  Case passed.

Defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan in court with attorney Ann M Heaps.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Filed, Defendant's Proposed Jury Instructions and Motion in Limine.  Final pretrial held.  Case remains calendared for jury trial on May 9, 2016 at 8:30 am in Branch 4.

Defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan in court with attorney Ann M Heaps.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense requested a final pretrial and jury trial date in Branch 21.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 21, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for May 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan in court with student intern, Francesco Balistreri under the supervision of attorney Zoe Everett for Ann M Heaps.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Attorney Heaps is in trial.  Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 21.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 15, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan in court with attorney Michael Jude for Ann M Heaps.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court grants defense request for another pretrial so that attorney Heaps can be present.  Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 21.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 3, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

16RM001028  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
01/02/2016
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with M.S. and A.H.

Cash bail that was previously posted to remain.
Court ordered no possession or use of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Demetrius Devone Bogan in court.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 21.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br. 21 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 14, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 1-5-16 @ 1:30 pm
